title: [QUESTION] is it possible export SKCanvas to SVG?
body:

Hi there, Now I would want to make a drawing-app, I wonder, is it possible export SKCanvas(or SKImage) to SVG?  I'd be grateful for any help 👍🏻

comments.author: charlesroddie
comments.body: Strange idea. If the question is "can bitmaps be embedded in SVGs" the answer is yes, but one would want to do this as little as possible.
